name: Unknown energy on one far planet (demo)
name_original: Unknown energy on one far planet (demo)
description: Thirty-second century. The astronomers on the Earth have noticed some unknown energy on one small planet which is quite far from the Earth. You have been given a mission - you should go there, explore the whole planet and discover the origin of this energy because it can be dangerous for the people. But it can be not so simple... (Demo)
